description: This file defines a Java Servlet Filter named AppAuthUserFilter that intercepts HTTP requests to extract a user authentication ID from a specific header and sets it into a request context for downstream processing. It also ensures cleanup of the context after processing.

classes.name: AppAuthUserFilter
classes.description: A Servlet Filter that retrieves a user ID from a specific HTTP header and sets it into a request context for authentication purposes.

methods.name: doFilter
methods.description: Intercepts HTTP requests to extract the user authentication ID from the 'X-Auth-Id' header, logs the request, sets the auth ID into a context, and ensures cleanup after processing.
